page.title: 10Clubs in Horsmonden
page.content: There are many organised spare-time activities in the village. The Beavers Club is for boys, 6-8 yrs. then come Cubs for 8-l0 yrs. and Scouts, l0-l5 yrs. Venture Scouts for over-l5 year-old boys and girls meets at Brenchley. For girls there are Brownies, 8-l0 yrs., Guides, l0-l4 yrs. and Rangers for over l4 yrs. Sunday Club is for boys and girls over l2 yrs. CHYPS and Youth Club meet at the Methodist Hall. Darby and Joan Club for over 60s meets fortnightly on Wednesdays in the Village Hall. Their Luncheon Club eats with the children in the school hall each Wednesday. Women's Club meets fortnightly, the Women's Institute and the Flower Club monthly. Wesley Guild meets fortnightly in the Winter.
